actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to provide financial assistance for the education of the dependents of persons engaged in the construction of additional hydroelectric power facilities at Chief Joseph Dam and Reservoir, Washington.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to provide education services for the dependents of persons engaged in the construction of the Chief Joseph Dam and Reservoir in Washington.

titles.title: A bill to provide financial assistance for the education of the dependents of persons engaged in the construction of additional hydroelectric power facilities at Chief Joseph Dam and Reservoir, Washington.
